chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall d d' : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d'

Premises:
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_ref_ok_check_0 = fix predta_ref_ok_check_0 (d d' : preDTA) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => state_ref_ok_check s d' | @M2 _ x y => predta_ref_ok_check_0 x d' && predta_ref_ok_check_0 y d' end : preDTA -> preDTA -> bool
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_ref_ok_check_correct_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d' -> predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
predta_ref_ok_check = fun d : preDTA => predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d : preDTA -> bool
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true
prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true
state_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d
prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_check = fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end : state -> preDTA -> bool
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
addr_in_dta_check = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => match MapGet state d a with | Some _ => true | None => false end : preDTA -> ad -> bool
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
DTA_taille = fix DTA_taille (d : preDTA) : nat := match d with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_1 y | @M2 _ x y => PeanoNat.Nat.max (DTA_taille x) (DTA_taille y) end : preDTA -> nat
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.exists_mem_3 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_3 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = false -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = false
Nleb_trans : forall a b c : N, Nleb a b = true -> Nleb b c = true -> Nleb a c = true

```coq
intros d d' H.
unfold predta_ref_ok_check_0 in H.
destruct d as [| | ]; simpl in H; try discriminate.
unfold predta_ref_ok_distinct in H.
destruct d' as [| | ]; simpl; try contradiction.
(* case M0 *)
unfold state_ref_ok in H.
apply state_ref_ok_check_correct in H.
unfold state_ref_ok_check in H.
(* case M1 *)
unfold state_ref_ok in H.
apply state_ref_ok_check_correct in H.
unfold state_ref_ok_check in H.
(* case M2 *)
unfold state_ref_ok in H.
apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
apply state_ref_ok_check_complete in H1.
apply state_ref_ok_check_complete in H2.
Qed.```

original: intros d d' H. unfold predta_ref_ok_check_0 in H. destruct d as [| | ]; simpl in H; try discriminate. unfold predta_ref_ok_distinct in H. destruct d' as [| | ]; simpl; try contradiction. unfold state_ref_ok in H. apply state_ref_ok_check_correct in H. unfold state_ref_ok_check in H. unfold state_ref_ok in H. apply state_ref_ok_check_correct in H. unfold state_ref_ok_check in H. unfold state_ref_ok in H. apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply state_ref_ok_check_complete in H1. apply state_ref_ok_check_complete in H2.
